channel.title: How can I delete clicking on skills to level up?
channel.description:
Ok basically I have a server, but to level up you click on the stats.
What I want to know is
1. how can i delete that 2. how can i make normal leveling system?, ( attack npc get xp ) Useing Noctural Pk If anyone could help me that'll be great!
Regards,
James

item.title: How can I delete clicking on skills to level up?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

re-work your combat system bro.

item.title: How can I delete clicking on skills to level up?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if your using a 317

go to client.java
search the message it says when you click on the screen: for example, when you click on it, it brings up this box you gootta type the skill level in it. Inside that box will show a message, and search that message in client.java
delete that entire code.
add combatexprate, I don’t really know where you add it, but try to find it somewhere

Read full topic

item.title: How can I delete clicking on skills to level up?
item.dc:creator: @baseball4355 baseball4355
item.description:
@baseball4355 wrote:

Obviously you would have to edit something in the code. I dont know what server your using so i dont know the files that are in it. So you have to find where the code to click on the skill is executed and then you can take it out.
